short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to convert and display written times in the user's home time zone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This quick helper converts global times to your local time zone when hovering over with your mouse. No need to manually search online!

Note: this is an MVP version. Feedback welcome!
